appearance.textBefore: An email has been sent to your email ID with password reset.An email has been sent to your email ID for user registration.An email has been sent to your email ID for user registration.Check the email account associated with your user name for further instructions. Remember to look in your spam folder, where automated messages sometimes filter. If you still can't log in, contact your administrator.
